GK16visa03cu:7: atha--kāvyasvarūpanirūpaṇānantaraṃ koyaṃ raso yadātmakaṃ vākyaṃ kāvyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:16: tasya pṛthagupādānaṃ ca govṛṣanyāyāt prāśastyārtham, praśastyaṃ ca ratyādeḥ śīghrapratipādakatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:18: tathāpi yatra śloke militā na santi tatraikenānyavyañjane vyabhicāriṇāmanyāpekṣayā śīghravyañjakatvabhityetaddvārā rasasyāpi śīghrapratipādakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:26: tataśca bhāvanopanītaḥ sa ratyādirvibhāvādiniṣṭhena svādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādyabhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatayā tathā pariṇamatīti pariṇāmavādasiddhāntena,
GK16visa03cu:35: yadyapīha milito ratyādiḥ prapānakarasanyāyena carvyamāṇo 'khaṇḍasvarūpo rasaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:50: ānīya nītaḥ svādyatvaṃ sthāyibhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:55: (vi, gha) nanu sāttvikabhāvo 'pi rasādivyañjakaḥ, sa kathaṃ nokta ityata āha---sāttvikāśceti /
GK16visa03cu:61: vyakto dadhyādinyāyena rūpāntarapariṇato vyaktīkṛta eva raso na tu dīpena ghaṭa iva pūrvasiddho vyajyate /
GK16visa03cu:66: tannyāyena rāmādiratyādireva vibhāvādiniṣṭhakhādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādau abhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatmakajñānarūpatayā pariṇamatītyarthaḥ /

GK16visa03cu:72: (lo, u) dadhyādīti---yathā dugdhaṃ dadhirūpeṇa pariṇamate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:75: “rasāḥ pratīyanta iti tvodanaṃ pacatītivad vyavahāraḥ” iti /

GK16visa03cu:95: rasatāmeti ratyādiḥ sthāyībhāvaḥ sacetasām“iti yaduktaṃ tatra sthāyītyasya upādānaphalamāha--atra ratyādīti /
GK16visa03cu:100: paraṃ kevalaṃ tādṛśo hāsakrodhādibhāvaḥ sthāyitāṃ pratipadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:111: (vi, ja) sattvodrekāditi kārikārthaṃ pratipadaṃ svayameva vyākhyāsyati /
GK16visa03cu:113: svākāravadabhinnatveneti---ayaṃ ratyādijñānarūpo rasaḥ pariṇāmavaśādratyādyabhinnatvena viśiṣṭa āsvādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:115: āropyamāṇarāmādiratyādyabhedana adhikaraṇībhūtasāmājikaratyādereva yaḥ svaprakāśa āsvādaḥ tasyeva rasatvāt tatra cābhinnatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:117: svākāravāde hi viṣayo jñānābhinno jñānasyākāra eveti /
GK16visa03cu:120: samprati kīdṛgasāvāsādyate yenaitadāsvādanalampaṭaḥ kāvye pravartiṣyate lokaḥ ityāśaṅkyoktāṃ sattvodrekāditi kārikāmavatārayati--asyeti /
GK16visa03cu:128: “rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ satvamihocyate” ityuktaprakāro bāhyameyavimukhatāpādakaḥ kaścanāntaro dharmaḥ sattvam /
GK16visa03cu:131: akhaṇḍa ityeka evāyaṃ vibhāvādiratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārātmakaḥ atra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:141: ayamāśayaḥ-“sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
GK16visa03cu:143: ityādi bhagavadvacanāt triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya prakāśe sukhetpattiḥ sattvāṃśasya prakāśaśca rajastamasorabhibhavād vaiṣayikaṃ sukhaṃ janayati /
GK16visa03cu:144: tathā hi sattvāṃśaprakāśatāratamyād vaiṣayikasukhasyāpi tāratamyaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:146: tacca sukhakāraṇaṃ yadi sakalalaukikasukhakāraṇottaraṃ tena rajastamasorabhibhavaḥ sarvathā śakyakriya eveti /
GK16visa03cu:147: tato nyāyāt lokottarakāvyārthaśravaṇarūpakāraṇāt sarvathā rajastamasyabhibhūya manasaḥ sattvāṃśasyaiva prakāśastadā tanmātrahetuko 'khaṇḍaprakāśarūpa ātmāvabodhaḥ pramāṇika eva /
GK16visa03cu:150: sa cātmānandād bodho yadi“anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nirasya prāṇato yataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:152: śāstrānayanahetukaḥ syāt tadā nirupahitaṃ brahma prakāśate /
GK16visa03cu:155: kāraṇavecitryasyaivāyaṃ sahṛdayānubhavasiddho 'nubhāva iti tasya ca ratyādyaṃśaśavalatve 'pi yathā svaprakāśatamoviruddhaṃ tathehagre darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:157: ratyādyaṃśaśavalatvādeva cāsya brahmāsvādasya sahodaratvaṃ; natu tattvaṃ sūtreṇoktam /
GK16visa03cu:170: vibhāvādiśca ratyādiśca tadviṣayaṃ yat svaprakāśarūpaṃ sukhaṃ tatsahitaḥ camatkāra ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:172: tādṛśasukhacamatkārayorekadā sthitau tatra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ “vyāpārosti vibhāvādeḥ“ityādinā /
GK16visa03cu:173: vibhāvādeḥ svādanākhyavyāpārasya camatkārahetutāyāḥ sāmājikānāṃ rāmādināyakābhedāropahetutāyāśca vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:174: cinmaya itīti---svaprakāśānanda eva cid jñānaṃ tat svarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:177: cittasya vistāraḥ ātmasaṃyogaviśeṣeṇa janitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānam /
GK16visa03cu:188: (vi, ña) rase sāra iti rasāsvādahetutvāt sāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:190: camatkārasya vismayarūpatvāt tena svaprakāśasukhe 'tiśayakaraṇāt tasya sāratvaṃ vilakṣaṇasukhātmakarasajanakatvam /
GK16visa03cu:191: tasmin sati śṛṅgārādirasakāvyeṣvapi adbhuto rasaḥ sambhavati /
GK16visa03cu:192: tathā ca sāmānyataḥ śṛṅgārādirase jāte 'dbhutamutpādya vilakṣaṇāsvādarūpaḥ prakṛṣṭaśṛṅgārādiraso janyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:193: kāvyaprakāśe tu āsvāda eva camatkāraḥ natu tadbhinno vismayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:209: “na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:210: “vilakṣaṇa evāyaṃ kṛtijñaptibhedebhyaḥ svādanākhyaḥ kaścid vyāpāra'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvācca /
GK16visa03cu:216: yathā yoginaḥ śuddhaṃ brahma svaprakāśānandacidrūpatayā sākṣātkurvanti ratyādyaṃśakarburitamapi tathā puṇyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:224: ācāryāstu śavalitasyaivānubhavāt sukhamanubhavāmīti pratisandhānasya ca tāvatavopapatteradhikaṃ necchanti /
GK16visa03cu:233: vastutastu saṃbhedāditi lyab--garbhatvāt pañcamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita iti /
GK16visa03cu:234: ātmānandeti---ātmani ya ānandastadrūpeṇa samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:238: tatsambhedāditi lyablope paccamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:240: tathāpi “rasaḥ svādyate” iti kālpanikaṃ bhedamurarī kṛtya karmakarttari vā prayogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:244_0: karmakartari veti--“bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayameva“ityatra ekasyaiva kuśūlasya karmatvakarttṛtvobhayavivakṣayā
GK16visa03cu:244_1: bhedāropavadatrāpi āsvādyāsvādanayorabhedepi bhedavivakṣayā karmakartari prayogaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:249: taduktam-“rasyamānatāmātrasāratvāt prakāśaśarīrādananya eva hi rasaḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:281: ghaṭādervyañjako yathā dīpo vibhāvādestathātvābhāvād ghaṭavyañjakadīpato vibhāvādeḥ pārthakyaṃ pṛthagbhāvo vailakṣaṇyamiti samudāyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:283: svaviṣayajñānena svajanyajñānena vā ghaṭadhiyo hetordepasya ghaṭavyañjakabhāvaprasaktyā “yathā dīpa';
GK16visa03cu:288_0: tathā ca svajanyajñānābhinnāyā anyasya jñānadanyasya dhiyo heturyaḥ sa eva siddhe
GK16visa03cu:288_1: jñānaṃ vināpi siddhe arthe vyañjako mato yathā dīpa ityarthaḥ vibhāvādistu svajanyavyañjanādhīnajñānabhinnasyā'svādātmakarasāderjanaka
GK16visa03cu:289: anyathābhāve anyathātve svajanyaṃ pratyapi svasvavyañjakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:290: asya vibhāvādeḥ kārakāt ko viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:291: ghaṭapratīpavat dvau yau vyaṅgyavyañjakau tayoḥ sakāśādanayoḥ rasavibhāvādyoḥ pārthakyaṃ vailakṣaṇyamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:292: na tu vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ parasparaṃ pārthakyaṃ bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:304: vyañjanāsvādayorāśaṅkitamaikyaṃ nirasya rasāvasthasya vyaṅgyatvābhāvaṃ siddhāntayan āha---“cet satyamiti” /
GK16visa03cu:307: siddhe natu sādhye vyañjako mataḥ śabda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:313: ityuktadiśā ghaṭapradīpavadvyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyameveti kathaṃ rasasya vyaṅgyateti cet, satyamuktam /
GK16visa03cu:317: uktadiśā dhvanikārādyuktamārgeṇa vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyamityanena vyañjanāyā vyaṅgyasya ca pārthakyaṃ nyāyasiddhameva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:325: jñāptiḥ jñāpako vyāpāraḥ, abhidhālakṣaṇāvyañjanāḥ; tebhyo vyāpārebhyo bhinna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:327: tathā ca tad viṣaya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:328: vyañjanādhīnajñānaṃ tu ratyadiviṣayaḥ tato bhinnameva ityato rasavyañjanādhīnajñānayornaikyamityuktam /

GK16visa03cu:334: (lo, u) ata eveti--; āhurityasya vyaṅgyatvamuktaṃ bhavatītyatra dūrasthenetiśabdenānvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:335: ata eva-yato jñānarūpa eva rasa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:344: ata eva hi rasanāsvādanacamatkaraṇādayo vilakṣaṇā eva vyapadeśāḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:350: nanu tarhi karuṇādīnāṃ rasānāṃ duḥ khayatvādrasatvaṃ (tadunmukhatvaṃ ) na syādityucyate--

GK16visa03cu:363: sāmājikānāṃ tu sukhameva jāyata ityatra sacetasāmanubhavaḥ pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:375: (vi, pa) asahṛdayānāmapi paraduḥ khajñānādapi duḥ khameva jāyate ityevaṃhṛdayānāmapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:377: kiñca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāttadunmukhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:378: nahi kaścat sacetā ātmano duḥkhāya pravarttate /
GK16visa03cu:391: duḥkhahetutva-prasaṅga iti--tathā ca tat--śravaṇe na kopi pravartate /
GK16visa03cu:399: (vi, bha) duḥ khahetubhya iti---paraśokādayaḥ svaduḥ khahetava eva, tebhyaḥ kathamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:402: śokaharṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visa03cu:406_1: laukikāḥ śokaharṣādayo jāyantāṃ nāmeti tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyena uktvā āha---alaukiketi /
GK16visa03cu:409: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visa03cu:412: (lo, e) hetutvamiti--hetutvaṃ gatebhyo rāmavanavāsādibhyo lokasaṃśrayāt; natu kāvyasaṃśrayāt /

GK16visa03cu:417: tebhyaśca surate dantadhātādibhya iva sukhameva jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:423: anena dekhakālādiviśeṣeṇaṣeṇa sukhamayasyāpi duḥ khamayatvaṃ; duḥ khamayasyāpi sukhamayatvam /
GK16visa03cu:426: ataśca “laukikaśokaharṣādikāraṇobhyo laukikaśokaharṣādayo jāyante” iti loka eva pratiniyamaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:432: “sarvebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyaḥ sukhameva jāyate” iti niyamānna kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:433: kathaṃ tarhi hariścandrādicaritasya kāvyanāṭyayorapi darśanaśravaṇābhyāmaśrupātā dayo jāyanta ityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:442: tarhi kathaṃ kāvyataḥ sarveṣāmīdṛśī rasābhivyaktirna jāyata ityata āha--
GK16visa03cu:443: na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visa03cu:449: tatra yadyādyā na syāttadā śrotriyajaranmīmāṃsakādīnāmapi sa syāt /
GK16visa03cu:453: otriyeti--jaranmīmāṃsakā hi kāryakāraṇabhāvāditarkamātrānuśīlanān na kāvyarasāsvādavantaḥ tadanuśīlanācca tadānīntanavāsanāvanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:454: naca prāktanavāsanābhāvādeva teṣāṃ na kāvyarasāsvāda ityevamucyatām,
GK16visa03cu:456: teṣāmeva tarkānuśīlanatyāgena kāvyānuśīlanābhyāse rasodvodhena idānīntanyā api avaśyaṃvācyatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:458: yadi dvitīyā na syāttadā yadragiṇā mapi keṣāñcidrasodvodho na dṛśyate tanna syāt /
GK16visa03cu:465: natu tatra idānīntanatvādipraveśaḥ jaran mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu atyantatarkānurāga eva pratibandha ityevānvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:486: svīyaratyādau rāmādiratyādyabhedāroparūpasya ca sādhāraṇī sā iti kārikārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:489: yasya hanūmadādeḥ pāthodhiplavanādayaḥ āsan pramātā tadabhedena svātmānaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:492: bhedāgrahe satyena abhedagraha upapadyate ityata āha---tadabhedeneti /
GK16visa03cu:502: sabhyānāṃ rāmādyabhedapratipattau nāṭyakāvyayoḥ rāvaṇādidarśanaśravaṇābhyāṃ roṣodvodhena sabhātaḥ samutthāya dhanurākarṣaṇādirbhavat /
GK16visa03cu:503: bhedena pratipattau tu ātmaniṣṭaroṣādisthāyibhāvodvodho na syāt /
GK16visa03cu:504: evaṃ ca yo doṣaḥ samanantarameva darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:551: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visa03cu:552: tadāsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visa03cu:558: evaṃ ca vibhāvādayaḥ svayaṃ sādhāraṇyena pratyāyayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:562: alaukikatvameteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visa03cu:573: asya yogārthasyānubhāvādāvapi sattveti paribhāṣāyā yogarūḍhatvānna tatra prayogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:580: evaṃbhūtasya āsvādāṅkuratāṃ prāpitasya ratyādeḥ svaniṣṭhasvādanākhyavyāpāreṇa rasarūpatayā praveśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:584: vibhāvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāraṇakāryyasahakāritve kathaṃ trayāṇāmapi rasodbodhe kāraṇatvamityucyate --
GK16visa03cu:590: rasodvodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇānyeva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visa03cu:591: nanu tarhi kathaṃ rasāsvāde teṣāmekaḥ pratibhāsa ityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:598: tataḥ sambalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sacetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visa03cu:606: nanu yadi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhirmmilitaireva rasastat kathaṃ teṣāmekasya dvayorvā sadbhāve 'pi sa syādityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:615: “dīrghākṣaṃ śaradindukāntivadanaṃ bāhū natāvaṃsayoḥ saṅkṣiptaṃ nibiḍonnatastanamuraḥ pārśve pramṛṣṭe iva /
GK16visa03cu:616: madhyaḥ pāṇimito nitambi jaghanaṃ pādāvudagrāṅgulī chando narttayituryathaiva manasaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ tathāsyā vapuḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:620: uttamanaṭīṃ nartuyiturmanaso yathaivacchanda icchā tathaivāsyā vapuḥ sṛṣṭam (vidhātrā)
GK16visa03cu:623: nibiḍau--anyonyasaṃsaktau unnatau ca stanau yatra tādṛśaṃ ca uruḥ /
GK16visa03cu:626: jaghanottarabhāgaḥ nitambaḥ praśastaḥ tad yuktaṃ jaghanam, udgrā-unnatā /
GK16visa03cu:631: sṛṣṭaṃ vidhātrā iti śeṣaḥ nartayitā nartakīṣu dīrghākṣatvādyabhinayena darśayituṃ śikṣayati,
GK16visa03cu:657: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca,
GK16visa03cu:669: (vi, ṭha) sa yadā kāvyārthabhāvakaḥ syāttadā sopi sāmājiko bhavedityāha---kiṃceti /
GK16visa03cu:673: yadi punarnaṭo 'pi kāvyārthabhāvanayā rāmādisvarūpatāmātmano darśayet tadā so 'pi sabhyamadhya eva gaṇyate /
GK16visa03cu:683_0: yadyapyuktarītyā rasasya sākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvena bhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:683_1: savikalpakajñānaviṣayatvaṃ taj-jñānasya sākṣātkararūpatvaṃ ca tathāpi tasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ
GK16visa03cu:683_2: sādhayituṃ sākṣāt kriyamāṇghaṭādito 'pi vailakṣaṇyasādhanena kautukādasākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ
GK16visa03cu:696: (lo, a) nāyaṃ jñāpya iti--ayaṃ rasaḥ sattāyāṃ sadbhāve pratītimantareṇābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:699: yo hi jñāpyo ghaṭādiḥ sannapi kadācidajñāto bhavati, na hyayaṃ tathā; pratītimantareṇābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:705: hetuviśeṣakāryatvaṃ rasasya ye vadanti tanmataṃ nirasyati---yasmādeṣa ityādi tasmānna kārya ityantena /
GK16visa03cu:706: ayamarthaḥ ---“prapānakarasanyāyāccarvyamāṇo raso bhavedityuktyā vibhāvādiratyādisamūhālambanātmako rasa ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:708: kecittu tatsamakālotpannaṃ vyañjanayāpi tādṛśaṃ samūhālambanānantaraṃ jāyate,
GK16visa03cu:713: na samūhālambanakāryaḥ svasya svakāryatvāt svakālotpattikasya vyañjanādhīnasamūhālambanāntarasyābhāvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:717: rasasyeti--nahi vibhāvādijñānakāraṇakamityanantaraṃ tataścānupalabhyamānakāraṇāntarasya rasasya na kāryatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:719: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /
GK16visa03cu:727: “pratīyamānaḥ prathamaṃ pratyekaṃ heturucyate“ityanena pratyekasya hetutvoktyā tatkāryatve vipratipattyabhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:732: (vi, ta) nanu tādṛśsamūhātambanakāraṇatve ko doṣaḥ ityāha--tataśceti /
GK16visa03cu:740: (vi, tha) kāraṇajñānasya sthitiḥ kāryajñānasyotpattiriti tu na sambhavatyeva /
GK16visa03cu:762: evaṃ rasasya samūhālambanakāryatvameva khaṇḍitaṃ natu kāryatvam /
GK16visa03cu:768: nanu pūrvasaṃvedanābhāvānnityatvābhāve itaraṣāmapi nityavastūnāmabhāvaprasaṅga ityata āha-asamvetaneti /
GK16visa03cu:772: asaṃvedanakāle hi na bhāvo 'ṣyasya vidyate (ka) // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visa03cu:775: (vi, na) nityatvābhāvaḥ spaṣṭa eva, tamāha--no nitya iti /
GK16visa03cu:781: (lo, i) nāpi bhaviṣyannityāha--sākṣādanubhūyamānasya hi kathaṃ bhaviṣyattm /
GK16visa03cu:782: yasya khalu vastuno bhaviṣyattvaṃ sahajo dharmastat sadā bhaviṣyadeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:788: (vi, pa) nāpi bhaviṣyanniti yadyapi saṃvedanāt pūrvam asattvenaiva bhaviṣyatvaṃ durapahnavam /
GK16visa03cu:789: tathāpi bhaviṣyatpadārthāntarasya sākṣādānandamayaprakāśatvasvarūpābhāvāt tadvailakṣaṇyameva bhaviṣyatvābhāvaḥ kautukāduktaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:797: yadyapi ghaṭādisādhāraṇajñāpyatvasyaiva samūhālambanakāryatvasyaiva cābhāvaḥ prag darśitaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:800: svaprakāśarūpasya svameva grāhakaṃ, tattu na nirvikalpakamityāha--vibhāvādīti /
GK16visa03cu:802: tat pradhānatvāditi kvacit pāṭhe tatparāmarśaḥ pratyekaṃ taj jñānaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:806: antye tu jñānajanyatvena nirvikalpakatvābhāvāt, jñānajanyajñānasyaiva nirvikalpakatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:809: tathā ca na nirvikalpakaṃ niṣprakārakajñānasyaiva tathātvāt /
GK16visa03cu:815: sa eva raso nirvikalpakajñānatvena gṛhyamāṇo na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:817: tatra pakṣe yasya grāhakatvamiṣyate ityatra nopacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:824: yadyapi tadgrāhakasya nirvikalpakatvābhāvayuktipradarśanenaiva savikalpakasaṃvedyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tathāpi savikalpakasaṃvedyāntarato vailakṣaṇyena tadavedyatvaṃ kautukāduktam /
GK16visa03cu:827: tasya vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāreṇaiva tasya jñeyatvam, natu kāvyasthaśabdena /
GK16visa03cu:828: pratyuta tasya tatkāvyasya śabdavācyatve svaśabdavācyatvaṃ doṣa eva vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:829: atra eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpyuktaṃ,“rasādilakṣaṇastvarthaḥ svapreti na vācya'; iti /
GK16visa03cu:831: savikalpakavedyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ tatkāvyasthaśabdenaiva vācyamiti tato vailakṣaṇyamiti vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:833: savikalpakajñānasaṃvedyānāṃ hi vacanaprayogayogyatā, na tu rasasya tathā /
GK16visa03cu:844: sākṣātkārānantaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanāya sākṣātkārarūpasyāpi tatprakāśasya sākṣātkāratvābhāvamapi kautukādāha--nāparokṣa iti /
GK16visa03cu:849: (lo, ṛ) tathābhilāpeti--atrāpi pūrvavat raso na savikalpakarūpa iti /
GK16visa03cu:855: ataḥ paramityatra idamānupūrvoktanirvikalpakaparāmarśaḥ śabdasaṃbhāvta śābdajñānam parokṣamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:857: pūrvaṃ na śruto na dṛṣṭaścoktasvarūpo nirūpaṇaprakāro yasya rasasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:864: itthaṃ kiñcit vastutaḥ kiñcicca kautukād vailakṣaṇyamuktvā kīdṛśaṃ tādṛśavilakṣaṇaṃ vastu tat iti pṛcchati; tat kathayati /
GK16visa03cu:877: tatkiṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ tasya sadbhāva ityāha--
GK16visa03cu:878: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visa03cu:886: evaṃ ca sahṛdayānubhava evātra pramāṇamiti paryavasyati /
GK16visa03cu:895: lakṣyavyaṅgyavastūnāṃ sambhedāt jñānāt ātmano rasasyānandarūpeṇa samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:898: nanu yadi raso na kāryastatkathaṃ mahaṣiṇā(ka)
GK16visa03cu:906: tatastadātmakasya rasasya tatsākṣātkārāṃśamātrajanyatvaṃ siddhāntayituṃ kautukoktamapi tasyākāryatvamuktvā āśaṅkate--nanu yadi raso na kārya iti /
GK16visa03cu:910: itthaṃ vibhāvāditaścarvaṇāyā niṣpattireva vāstavikaratyādyaṃśasya tato niṣpattirupacaritetyuktyā carvaṇāṃśasyāpi niṣpattirupacaritaiveti vaktumāha---yadyapīti /
GK16visa03cu:913: tataśca ratyādirūparasābhinna eva carvaṇātmakaḥ sākṣātkārastathā ratyādeḥ vibhāvādyakāryatayaiva carvaṇasyāpi vibhāvādyakāryatvamarthasiddhamiti yadyapi ratyāderarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:915: tathāpi tasya kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate /
GK16visa03cu:921: kintu vibhāvādijñānettarameva niṣpannetyevaṃ kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate ityartha /
GK16visa03cu:922: nacaivamanyathāsiddhavibhāvādijñānottarabhāvitvena tatkāryatvaṃ carvaṇāyām avāstavameva tat kathamupacāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa03cu:926: yadyapītyādi---ayamarthaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa rasābhinne carvaṇe kādācitkatvād vastuni vyabhicāreṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvādevopacaryate /
GK16visa03cu:927: tena carvaṇasyāparicitena kāryatvena tadabhinne rasepi kāryatvamupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:940: nanu yadi militā ratyādayo rasāstatkathamasya svaprakāśatvaṃ kathaṃ vākhaṇḍatvamityāha--
GK16visa03cu:961: tasya pratimānataḥ satsādṛśyāt ityādyaṃśopi svaprakāśa iti /
GK16visa03cu:962: nanu yadi caitanyasya sajñānatvena jaḍasya svaprakāśatā tadā pramātṛbhāvamāpannasyāntaḥ karaṇasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ syāditi cenmaivam /
GK16visa03cu:963: tatra hi triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭatvam /
GK16visa03cu:965: naca tayoḥ śavalatvamapi tāttvikaṃ, kuto tādātmyamiti, kimārdrakavaṇijāṃ no vahitracintayā'; /
GK16visa03cu:967: yadi ratyādikaṃ prakāśaśarīrādatiriktaṃ syāttadaivāsya svaprakāśatvaṃ na sidhyate,
GK16visa03cu:970: “yadyapi rasānanyatayā carvaṇāpi na kāryā tathāpi kādācitkatayā kāryatvamupakalpya tadekātmanyanādivāsanāpariṇatirūpe ratyādibhāve 'pi vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:971: “sukhāditādātmyāḍgīkāre cāsmākī siddhāntaśayyāmadhiśayya divyaṃ varṣasahastraṃ pramodanidrāmupeyāḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:972: “abhinno 'pi sa pramātrā vāsanopanītaratyāditādātmyena gocarīkṛtaḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:978: tayā rasādirūpā pariṇatiryasya tādṛśarūpe ratyādibhāge vibhāvādikāryatvavyavahāraḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:979: dvitīya iti ceti paryantaṃ samvādavākyatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:986: gecarīkṛta iti cidānandamayoyaṃ puruṣa iti vadupacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:990: ratyādayo hi prathamamekaikaśaḥ pratīyamānāḥ sarve 'pyekībhūtāḥ sphuranta eva rasatāmāpadyante /
GK16visa03cu:1001: vibhāvā ityādi kārikāyāṃ ratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārā akaṇṭhoktā api prakaraṇadavaseyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1008: brahmatattvavaditi---khaṇḍākhaṇaaḍanānāpadārthānām advaitabhāvānayā akhaṇḍasvarūpatvāt brahmatattvasya itica ityantaṃ samvādavākyam /
GK16visa03cu:1011: [text of comm. wanting in both printed ed. and Sansknet e-text!]
GK16visa03cu:1013: athaṃ ke te vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa ityapekṣāyāṃ vibhāvamāha--
GK16visa03cu:1018_0: ye hi loke rāmādigataratihāsādīnāmudvodhakāraṇāni sītādayasta eva kāvye nāṭye ca
GK16visa03cu:1023: natu pratītyarthaṃ kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa bhāvyantetatpratipādanasāmarthya eva tathātvaucityādityata āhaāsvādāṅkureti /
GK16visa03cu:1026: ato vibhāvā ucyante ityarthaḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvānāṃ tathātvakaraṇaṃ rāmādiratyādīnāṃ ca tatrāropāt bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:1029: asyā paribhāṣāyāyogārūḍhatvādetadyogārthasyānubhāvādau sattvepi na tatra prayoga iti prāgapyuktam /
GK16visa03cu:1037: śabdopahiteti--tān prasiddhān kaṃsādīn śrīkṛṣṇādikrodhasya raudrarasasthāyibhāvasthālambanavibhāvān śabdopahitarūpān śabdopasthāpyāt pratyakṣāniva sāmājikā manyante /
GK16visa03cu:1044: śabdeti---śabdopahitarūpān kāvyarūpaśabdopādhinā śravaṇāt tadvuddhiviṣayatāmāpannānāṃ sādhanatvena sotsāhādyudabodhe manyante sabhyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1053: atha yasya rasasya yo vibhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1081: prathamaṃ caturbheda iti---paścāttu dhīrodāttādīnām api dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭatvādibhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1117: tatra teṣāṃ dhīrodāttādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭānukūlaśaṭhatvena ṣoḍaśaprakārā nāyakaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1118: eṣu tvanekamahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visa03cu:1130: ityantaḥ purasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyā vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1134: anekapatnīsambhogārhā iyaṃ rātririti tatkarmaniyuktasya rājñi nivedanam /
GK16visa03cu:1141: sarvāsu anurāgasāmyena kasyāpyupekṣānarhatvāt apratipattyā kartavyanirṇayābhāvena mūḍhamanaskatvena dvitrādidaṇḍasthitiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1151: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ tayā,
GK16visa03cu:1153: kiñcittatra vidhātumakṣamatayā bāṣpaṃ sṛjantyāḥ sakhe ! dhyātaścetasi kautukaṃ vitanute kopo 'pi vāmabhruvaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1157_0: śoṇaṃ vīkṣyeti---roṣāruṇamukhīṃ priyāṃ cumbituṃ gatasya tayā prahartumudyataṃ pādaṃ
GK16visa03cu:1157_1: dhṛtvā kiñcit kartumakṣamīkṛtāṃ rudatīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hasitavato nāyakasya sakhyau vṛttāntakathanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:1169: kintvanye 'pi janā vadanti subhago 'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭaṃ nikṣipatīti viśvamiyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam //
GK16visa03cu:1172: (vi, ṇa) asmākaṃ sakhīti--paṣyau subhagāyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1174: kintu na kevalamahamanyepi janā vadanti asyāḥ patiranyato 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na nikṣipatīti /
GK16visa03cu:1176: mayi asūyayā madapekṣayā saubhāgyālpatvena vā duḥ sthitaṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16visa03cu:1182: graiveyakaṃ, kaṇṭhābharaṇam, madopi yauvanādyahaṅkārajanitaḥ garvopi naivāsti /
GK16visa03cu:1186: yaḥ punarekasyāmeva nāyikāyāṃ baddhabhāvo dvayorapi nāyikayorbahirdarśitānurāgo 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ gūḍhaṃ vipriyamācarita sa śaṭhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1189: tadetatkvācakṣe ghṛtamadhumayatvadvahuvaco- viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi na sakhī me gaṇayati” //
GK16visa03cu:1192: (vi, ta) śaṭhānyasyā iti---nāyikāyā vipriyakāriṇaṃ nāyakaṃ bhartsayantyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1193: he śaṭha ! mama sakhīm āśliṣyanneva tvaṃ yadanyasyā nāyikāyāḥ kāñcīmaṇiraṇitaśabdamākarṇya sahasā praśithilabhujagranthiḥ (vāhuveṣṭanaṃ)
GK16visa03cu:1195: ato me sakhī ghṛtamadhumayena miśritaghṛtamadhurūpeṇa tvadīyabahucāṭuvacoviṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi kartavyaṃ na gaṇayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1210: atha prasaṅgāditi---atra eṣāmityanena nāyakamātrasyaiva parāmarśo natu prakānta śṛṅgārīyāṣṭacatvāriṃśata eva /
GK16visa03cu:1211: ata eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyo darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1228: dūrānuvartinīti vyācaṣṭe---tasyeti dūrānuvartini ityasya vyākhyā bahuvyāpinīti bahudeśavyāpyasādhye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1234: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
GK16visa03cu:1238: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visa03cu:1254: karmaṇā, vapuṣā, veśena, vāsanadinā bhāṣādyaiḥ sarveṣāṃ hāsyaṃ janayati /
GK16visa03cu:1274: “mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane” iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam,
GK16visa03cu:1277: “nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ” ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1280: (vi, ma) svaṃ ceti--svaṃ rājā tasya rājñaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1282: atra svasyāpi sahāyatvena kathanāt pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1289: na cārthacintane tasya mantrī sahāyaḥ, kiṃ tu svayameva saṃpādakaḥ; tasyārthacintanādyabhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1293: mantriṇeti---lalito dhīralalitastādṛśo rājā mantriṇaivārthasādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:1298: “niścinto mṛduraniśaṃ kalāparo dhīralalitaḥ syāditi dhīralalitalakṣaṇe niścintetvainārthacintanasya mantrimātraniṣṭhatvasiddhestasya mantriṇaḥ sahāyatākathanaṃ gatārthamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1302: ayaṃ mantrī syādarthānāṃ cintāyāmiti sūtrasya parabhāgaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1306: sahāyakathanaprastāve mantriṇa eva sahāyatvakathanaṃ yuktam; natu ātmana ubhayasya vā /
GK16visa03cu:1308: kintu rājā kenārthacintanaṃ kuryādityapekṣāyāmeva kvacin mantriṇā kvacidātmanā,
GK16visa03cu:1311: kiñca tadapyarthacintanopāyaprakaraṇa eva lakṣitavyam; natu sahāyakathanaprakaraṇe /
GK16visa03cu:1319: so 'yamanūḍhābhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ityuktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
GK16visa03cu:1323: duṣkulatā aiśvaryaṃ ca tābhyāṃ saṃyuktopi madamūrkhatābhyāmabhimānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1329: naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairmanuṣyagaṇanābhāvādapāsya trapā- mantaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsādayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1330: paryantāśrayibhinijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ kubjā nīcatayaiva yānti śanakairātmekṣaṇāśaṅkinaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1334: naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairiti---rājño vājiśālāta āgatamekaṃ mahāvanaraṃ dṛṣṭvā antaḥ purasthanapuṃsakādīnāṃ bhītikriyāvarṇanamidam /

GK16visa03cu:2104: priyaḥ kṛtvāpi saṃketaṃ yasyā nāyāti saṃnidhim /
GK16visa03cu:2105: vipralabdhā tu sā jñeyā nitāntamavamānitā // VisSd_3.83 //
GK16visa03cu:2114: yā nāyikā ataḥ paramapi jīvet tasyā evāsau jīvitanātho bhavet; bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:2120: “tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīmivaikām /
GK16visa03cu:2121: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāṃ guruṣu divaseṣveṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām” //
GK16visa03cu:2126: tāṃ jānīyā iti---śāpapratiruddhapriyāsaṃnidhagamanasya yakṣasya meghaṃ saṃbodhya priyāvasthākathanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:2128: eṣu guruṣu divaseṣu gacchatsugāḍhotkaṇṭhāmata eva śiśiramathitāṃ padminīmivānyarūpāṃ jātāmaham ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2134: “vidūre keyūre kuru, karayuge ratnavalayair alaṃ, gurvo grīvābharaṇalatikeyaṃ kimanayā /
GK16visa03cu:2135: navāmekāmekāvalimayi mayi tvaṃ viracayer na nepathyaṃ bahutaramanaṅgotsavavidhau” //
GK16visa03cu:2139: sajjite keliyogyatayā sajjīkṛte vāsaveśmani yasyā maṇḍanaṃ sakhī kuruta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2143: vāsagṛhe nāyakasaṃyogārtham alpabhūṣaṇaracanārthaṃ sakhīṃ prerayantyāstāṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2144: ayi sakhi tvaṃ navīnām ekāmekāvalīṃ hāraṃ mayi viracayeḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2145: yato 'naṅgotsavavidhau bahutaraṃ nepathyaṃ veśaḥ na pathyaṃ na hitam;
GK16visa03cu:2146: kaṭhinasaṃyogatvena āliṅgane duḥ khadāyakakṛt atolaṅkārāntaraṃ niṣedhati /
GK16visa03cu:2158: ityālocya mṛgīdṛśā karatale vinyasya vaktrāmbujaṃ dīrghaṃ niḥ śvasitaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:2165_0: kiṃ ruddha iti---paroḍhākanyakayorupanāyakasya svīyāyāśca sapatnigṛhaṃ gatasya nāyakasyānāgamanenotkaṇṭhitayā
GK16visa03cu:2165_1: iti pūrvārddhektimālocya vaktrāmbujaṃ karatale vinyasya dīrghaṃ niśvasitamityādi /
GK16visa03cu:2187: atra parastriyoḥ kanyakoḍhayoravasthātrayasya evāsaṃbhavāt aṣṭaguṇatvābhāvena uktasaṃkhyāna bhaviṣyatīti kaścidāha--tadṛrśayati /
GK16visa03cu:2189: saṃketāt pūrvamiti saṃketāt hetoḥ pūrvaṃ vilahotkaṇṭhite paścāt vidūṣaketyādyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2194: vāsakasajjātvāvasthā tu patighaṭitaiva na bhavati ityataḥ kanyakāparoḍhayorapi tāḥ pañcāvasthāḥ saṃbhavantyeva /
GK16visa03cu:2195: evaṃ ca svastriyā api pitṛgṛhasthāyāḥ pitradhīnatvena patyā saha svacchandasambhogāsaṃbhavāt /
GK16visa03cu:2201: kaścidityasaṃtoṣoktiḥ, tathā hi jayadevakṛtagītagovinde mama pitṝṇāṃ kaṃsavadhe parastriyā rādhikāyā
GK16visa03cu:2205: tathāpi mānena kathaṃcid vibhāvadarśanārthamabhimukhaṃ nāyake gate kalahāntaritātvam /
GK16visa03cu:2215: “na khalu vayamamuṣya dānayogyāḥ pibati ca pāti ca yāsakau rahastvām /
GK16visa03cu:2216: viṭa ! viṭapamamuṃ dadasva tasyai bhavati yataḥ sadṛśościrāya yogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2220: na khalu vayamiti---kusumitaviṭapaṃ ditsuṃ svanāyakaṃ prati kopanāyā uktiriyam “he viṭa ! dhūrtta !amuṣya viṭapasya dānayogyā na khalu vayam /
GK16visa03cu:2221: kintu asakau asau yā upanāyikā tvāṃ cakṣuṣā pibati surate prītijananāt pratipālayati ca tasyai amu viṭapaṃ dadasva yataḥ sadṛśoryogaśacirāya bhavati /
GK16visa03cu:2222: asadṛśostu kṣaṇikakṛt niṣphala ityarthaḥ, sadṛśatvaṃ ca darśitayogārthavaśāt /
GK16visa03cu:2223: sāpi viṭapī ayaṃ ca viṭapa iti sādṛśyam /
GK16visa03cu:2226: na khalviti--pibati sarvato niruddhaprasarīkṛtya svāmatrāyattatāyāṃ praveśayati upabhuṅktevā /
GK16visa03cu:2231: evañcānayorviṭapatvena sadṛśayorviṭapayuvayorvā garhitatvena sadṛśayorvā ucito yogo yataḥ tasyaiva viṭapapradānena bhavatīti ubhayathā sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2238: tava kitaveti---vṛkṣapallavaṃ karṇapūraṃ dadānaṃ nāyakaṃ prati kopanāyāḥ nāyikāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2239: he kitava ! dhūrta ! āhataiḥ dattaiḥ kṣitiruhāṇāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ pallavarūpaiḥ karṇapūraiḥ mama kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2240: nanu bhoḥ janaviditaiḥ bhavadvyalīkaiḥ bhavadapakarmabhiḥ mama karṇayugmaṃ ciraparipūritameva /
GK16visa03cu:2241: tathā ca yogārthavaśāt bhavadvyalīkameva me karṇapūra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2244: vasatimupagatena dhāmni tasyāḥ śaṭha ! kalireṣa mahāṃstvayādya dattaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2250: iti gaditeti---pūrvarṇitanāyikāto 'nyā nāyikā iti gaditavatī satī ruṣā amburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca taṃ nāyakaṃ jaghāna /
GK16visa03cu:2251: kaṣayitacakṣuṣā darśanameva hananam amburuhacakṣuṣordvayoḥ viśeṣaṇamāha---sphuriteti---sphuritaṃ manoharaṃ pakṣmaiva keśaravat yasya tādṛśena cakṣuṣā /
GK16visa03cu:2253: tathā śravaṇaparyantaniyamitena cakṣuṣā śravaṇe niyamitena amburuheṇa ubhayatra sthāpanameva niyamanam /
GK16visa03cu:2255: iyaṃ hi vakroktyā paruṣavacanena karṇotpalatāḍanena ca dhīramadhyatādhīramadhyatādhīrapragalbhatābhiḥ saṃkīrṇā /
GK16visa03cu:2271: śobhā kāntiśca dīptiśca mādhuryaṃ ca pragalbhatā /
GK16visa03cu:2274: moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vibhramo lalitaṃ madaḥ // VisSd_3.91 //
GK16visa03cu:2278: pūrve bhāvādayo dhairyāntā daśa nāyakānāmapi saṃbhavanti /
GK16visa03cu:2279: kiṃtu sarve 'pyamī nāyikāśritā eva vicchittiviśeṣaṃ puṣṇānti /
GK16visa03cu:2285: atra bhāvādyāstrayaḥ śobhādyāḥ sapta līlādyā aṣṭādaśa iti aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2293: janmataḥ prabhṛti nirvikāre manasi udbuddhamātro vikāro bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2295: “sa eva surabhiḥ kālaḥ sa eva malayānilaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2306: vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpīti--tapasyato maheśasya samīpe kāmena dhanuṣi āropite pārvalā hāvavarṇanamidam,
GK16visa03cu:2309: bālakadambapuṣpatulyatām aṅgānāṃ pulakena mukhena sācīkṛtā vakrīkṛtā;
GK16visa03cu:2313: vivṛṇvatīti atna hāve 'pi bhāvaviśeṣatvāt bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ mukhena sācīkṛtā na saṃmukhībhūtetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2320: “taha te jhatti pauttā vahue savvaṅgavibbhamā saalā /
GK16visa03cu:2321: saṃsai amuddhabhāvā hoi ciraṃ jai sahīṇaṃ pi” //
GK16visa03cu:2324: (vi, pa) tathā tasyā jhaṭiti pravṛttā vadhvāḥ sarvāṅgavibhramāḥ sakalāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2335: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa03cu:2339: asambhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamiti--sā pārvatī atha anantaraṃ bālyāt paraṃ vayaḥ yauvanaṃ prapede /
GK16visa03cu:2340: vayasi rūpakāṇyāha--asambhṛtam iti haritālādi saṃbhārajanitam aṅgayaṣṭermaṇḍanam /
GK16visa03cu:2342: anāsavākhyam āsavasya madirāyā yā ākhyā saṃjñā tadrahitamāsavabhinnamitiyāvat /
GK16visa03cu:2343: puṣpabhinnaṃ kāmasya astram aṅgabhūṣaṇam aṅgaśobhā asambhṛtamaṇḍanamiti /
GK16visa03cu:2372: “sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśolarlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti /
GK16visa03cu:2373: iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimi hi madhuraṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām” //
GK16visa03cu:2377: ato madhurāṇāmākṛtīnāṃ kimiva maṇḍanam, tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha---sarasijamiti--anuviddhaṃ sambaddham /
GK16visa03cu:2389: “na brūte paruṣāṃ giraṃ vitanute na bhrayugaṃ bhaṅgaraṃ,
GK16visa03cu:2390: nottaṃsaṃ kṣipati kṣitau śravaṇataḥ sā me sphuṭe 'pyāgasi /
GK16visa03cu:2391: kāntā garbhagṛhe gāvākṣavivaravyāpāritākṣyā bahīḥ sakhyā vaktramabhiprayacchati paraṃ paryaśruṇī locane” //
GK16visa03cu:2396: me mama sphuṭe 'pyāgasi aparādhe s kāntā sakhyā vaktramabhi sakhyā vaktre paryyaśruṇī locane prayacchati /
GK16visa03cu:2397: sakhyāḥ kīdṛśayāḥ sāgasaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ gavākṣavivaravyāpāritākṣyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2398: mantu paruṣaṃ ruṣā na brūte ityādi spaṣṭam /
GK16visa03cu:2406: mama tu dayitaḥ ślāghyastāto jananyamalānvayā kulamamalinaṃ na tvevāyaṃ jano na ca jīvitam” //
GK16visa03cu:2409: (vi, ra) muktātmaślāghaneti---acañcalā manovṛttiryā muktātmaślāghanā sā dhairyyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2410: jvalatu iti gaurikāvivāhe udvejamānāyāstatra saṃmitāyāḥ mālatyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2411: mama virahoddīpanāya rātrau akhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī jvalatu /
GK16visa03cu:2413: mṛtyoḥ pareṇa karmaṇā kiṃvā tena vidhāsyate /
GK16visa03cu:2415: tathāpi pitṛmātṛkulakalaṅkaṃ na janayiṣyāmi ityabhiprāyeṇāha---mama tviti /
GK16visa03cu:2416: atastu mayi mama dayitaḥ drayāyogyo yataḥ khlāghyaḥ niṣkalaṅkaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2419: natvevāyaṃ jano mādhavaḥ dayito jīvitañca na dayitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2432: veṇībandhātmakakapardinī pārvatī sarpavalayasya jaṭāvato harasyānukāriṇī jagat pātvityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2446: atrāntara iti---vakulavīthyām upaviṣṭaṃ mādhavaṃ vilokya gajena yāntyā mālatyā harṣakriyāṃ makarande kathayataḥ mādhavasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2453: manmathadevārādhanena yaṃ yaṃ bhāvaviśeṣamadhigatavatī taṃ taṃ tatra prakāśitavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2459: vāsastu pratanu viviktamastvitīyānākalpo yadi kusumeṣuṇā na śūnyaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2464: svacchāmbha iti--vilāsinīnāmākalpo veśaḥ kusumeṣuṇā yadi na śūnyaḥ tadā iyānapyastu /
GK16visa03cu:2465: sa ka ityatrāha--svaccheti--svacchāmbhasi snapanena vidhautaṃ vikṣālitamaṅgam /
GK16visa03cu:2475: atyantābhimate 'pi vastuni vidhiryāsāṃ niṣedhātmaka- stāstrailokyavilakṣaṇaprakṛtayo vāmāḥ prasidantu te” //
GK16visa03cu:2478: (vi, ṣa) yāsāmiti---satyapi bhāve vāmācaraṇaśīlāsu nāyikāsu anurāgiṇaḥ kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2480: tacca garvāt cāṭuṃ kārayituṃ priyeparaṃ kevalaṃ prāṇān arpayantīti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2485: atyantābhimate iti--niṣadhātmako vidhiḥ kimanenāsmākam ityādyanādarayuktamevābhimatavastunaḥ aparigraha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2492: kāminaḥ sma kurute karabhorurhāri śuṣkaruditaṃ ca sukhe 'pi” //
GK16visa03cu:2496: karabhorūḥ kāminaḥ pāṇirodhādikamavirodhitetyādi viśiṣṭaṃ yathā syāt tathā kurute sma /
GK16visa03cu:2508: vallabhasya kathādiṣu prasaṅgeṣu kenāpyārabhyamāṇeṣu tadbhāvabhāvite tadanurāganiṣovite citte sati karṇakaṇaaḍūyanādikaṃ moṭṭāyitamiti prāhuḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2515: āhuḥ kuṭṭamitaṃ nāma śiraḥ karavidhūnanam // VisSd_3.103 //
GK16visa03cu:2522: pallavopamiti iti---abhīṣṭe priye 'dharabimbaṃ daṣṭavati sati arthāt niṣedhārthaṃ dhūyamānena kareṇa paryyakūjītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2534: asthāne vibhramādīnāṃ vinyāso vibhramo mataḥ // VisSd_3.104 //
GK16visa03cu:2542: (vi, ka) sukumāratayeti---aṅgānāṃ vinyāso vilakṣaṇanyāsaḥ sukumāratayā komalatayā /
GK16visa03cu:2550: lalitaṃ sundaram, natu prakṛtalalitabhāvam, nartanasyaiva tattvāt /
GK16visa03cu:2556: “mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti /
GK16visa03cu:2557: anyāpi kiṃ na khalu bhājanamīdṛśīnāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:2562: mā garvamiti--anyanāyikāyāḥ patisaubhagyādhīnagarvaṃ sūcayantyāḥ tatsakhyāḥ tat sapatnyāmuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:2563: he sākhi ! mama kapolatale kāntasvahastalikhitā mañjarī puṣpakalikā cakāsti śobhate iti garva mā udvahaṃ /
GK16visa03cu:2565: anyā tava sapatnī mama sakhī kiṃ kapole tanna likhatītyatrāha /
GK16visa03cu:2566: vairīti--vepathuratra mañjarīlikhanādhikāraṇamalābho nāyikāyā eva patyurbhāvātiśayadarśanena bhāvodayāt--natu lekhakasya patyuḥ pāṇeḥ,
GK16visa03cu:2575: “dūrāgatena kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭā novāca sā mayā kiñcit /
GK16visa03cu:2576: paryaśruṇī tu nayane tasyāḥ kathayāmbabhūvatuḥ sarvam” //
GK16visa03cu:2581: mayā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭetyanvayaḥ sarvamitivirahādhīnaṃ tat tadduḥ khamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2598: he tasyāḥ prāṇasamāna ! tava virahe tava priyā śvāsān muñcatītyādi /
GK16visa03cu:2607: vallabhasya puraḥ proktaṃ maugdhyaṃ tattattvavedibhiḥ // VisSd_3.107 //
GK16visa03cu:2609: ke drumāste kva vā grāme santi kena praropitāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2613: (vi, ca) ajñānādiveti---pratītasyāpi vastunaḥ ajñānādiva yā vallabhasya puraḥ pṛcchā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2639: prasādhikālambitamiti---indumatyā svayaṃ vṛtasya ajasya purīpraveśe didṛkṣoḥ striyāḥ kriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:2640_0: prasādhikayā striyā ālambitam agrapādaṃ padāgram dravarāgamaśuṣkālaktakameva kācit
GK16visa03cu:2640_1: purastrī ākṣipya ākṛṣya utsṛṣṭalīlāgatiḥ tyaktalīlāgatiḥ satī padavīmāgavākṣāt gavākṣaparyyantam
GK16visa03cu:2649: (vi, jha) avasmādeveti---iyaṃ tanvī yat punarakasmādeva jahāsa tena iti pūraṇāduttarārddhānvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2650: svārājyaṃ svargarājatvam iyameva svarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2656: kṣubhyanti prasabhamaho vināpi hetorlīlābhiḥ kimu sati kāraṇo taruṇyaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:2659: (vi, ña) kuto 'pīti---dayitasyāgre kuto 'pi hetoḥ bhayasaṃbhramaḥ vyākulatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2661: vāmorūḥ calaśapharībhirvighaṭṭitorūḥ satī trasyantī vibhramasya vilāsasyātiśayamāpa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2663: aho taruṇyaḥ hetorvināpi līlābhiḥ pratatamatiśayaṃ kṣubhyanti saṃcalanti kāraṇe tu sati kimu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2666: vihāre saha kāntena krīḍitaṃ kolirucyate // VisSd_3.110 //
GK16visa03cu:2673: vyapohitumiti---kācidunnatapīvarastanī unmanāḥ kāmodvignamanāḥ priyamurasi pīvarastanena jaghāna /
GK16visa03cu:2674: kīdṛsaṃ priyam puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ tasyā locanato mukhanilairvyapohitum apākarttum apārayantam /
GK16visa03cu:2677: dṛṣṭavā darśayati vrīṅāṃ sammukhaṃ naiva paśyati /
GK16visa03cu:2678: pracchannaṃ vā bhramantaṃ vātikrāntaṃ paśyati priyam // VisSd_3.111 //
GK16visa03cu:2690: cirāya savidhe sthānaṃ priyasya bahu manyate /
GK16visa03cu:2697: bāhumūlaṃ stanau nābhipaṅkajaṃ darśayet sphuṭam // VisSd_3.115 //
GK16visa03cu:2699: viśvasityasya mitreṣu bahumānaṃ karoti ca // VisSd_3.116 //
GK16visa03cu:2700: sakhīmaghye guṇān brūte svadhanaṃ pradadāti ca /
GK16visa03cu:2703: (vi, ḍha) svadhanaṃ dadāti ca ityatra yācakāya bhatte iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2705: supte svapiti duḥkhe 'sya duḥkhaṃ dhatte sukhe sukham // VisSd_3.117 //
GK16visa03cu:2709: (vi, ṇa) priye dūrataḥ paśyati sati iti śaśvat vāramvāram asya dṛṣṭipathe sthitā bhavatīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:2712: priyasya dṛṣṭipathe sthitā tasmin dūrataḥ paśyati sati /
GK16visa03cu:2714: yadi ca priyasya kathāṃ kathayati tadādhomukhī satī kathayati /
GK16visa03cu:2734: pūrvaṃ kaṭākṣapūrvakahāsoktiḥ; idānīṃ kaṭākṣamatrasya iti bhedraḥ /

GK16visa03cu:3467: glapayati paripāṇḍu kṣāmamasyāḥ śarīraṃ śaradija iva gharmaḥ ketakīgarbhapatram” //
GK16visa03cu:3473: dāruṇo dīrghaśokaḥ asyāḥ kṣāmaṃ kṣīṇaṃ paripāṇḍu ca śarīraṃ glapayati /
GK16visa03cu:3493: (lo, ai) kamaleṇeti---“kamalena vikasitena saṃyojayantī virodhinaṃ śaśibimbam /
GK16visa03cu:3504: ete ca trayastriṃśadvyabhicāribhedā iti yaduktaṃ tadupalakṣaṇamityāha--
GK16visa03cu:3507: teṣāṃ kvacit prādhānye kvacit aprādhānye na kācita pratītikṣatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3510: tathāhi--śṛṅgāre 'nucchidyamānatayāvasthānād ratireva sthāyiśabdavācyā hāsaḥ punarupadyamāno vyabhicāryeva /
GK16visa03cu:3519: sthāyibhāvo 'pi vyabhicāribhāvo bhavatyatra saṃvādaṃ darśayati--rasāvastha iti /
GK16visa03cu:3520: rasa eva uttarakālam avasthā yasya paraṃ kevalaṃ tādṛśa eva bhāvaḥ ratyādisthāyitvam pratipadyate /
GK16visa03cu:3521: atādṛghavasthastu na sthāyitāṃ pratipadyate iti pahaṃ padāllabhyate /
GK16visa03cu:3523: sa ca yadi tatra upakārako bhavati tadā tadīyasthāyini ābhimukhyena caraṇād vyabhicārilakṣaṇākrāntatvena tatrāpi vyabhicāripadasya yogarūḍhatvātso 'pi vyabhicārī bhavati,
GK16visa03cu:3533: ityādyanyatsamunneyamiti---ata eva yaḥ kaumārahara ityatrādbhutarasasthāyibhāvasya vismayasya vyabhicāribhāvatvam /
GK16visa03cu:3535: rasasyaiva hi prādhānyāt iti kāvyaprakāśalikhane rasapadasya vyabhicāribhāvaparatvaṃ vyākhyānādavasīyate /
GK16visa03cu:3542: (vi, ṅa) aviruddhā viruddhā veti--sthāyibhāvasya aviruddhā viruddhā vāvyabhicāribhāvā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3547: na tirodhīyate sthāyī tairasau puṣyate param” //
GK16visa03cu:3552: bhāvānāṃ vyabhicāribhāvānām anugāmukaḥ sambaddhaḥ sthāyī tairbhāvairna tirodhīyate na buddhyaviṣayīkriyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3563: stravasūtraṃ sarveṣāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ muktānāṃ vā yathā anugataṃ tiṣṭati tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3568: jugupsā vismayaścetthamaṣṭau proktāḥ śamo 'pi ca // VisSd_3.175 //
GK16visa03cu:3571: śāntirasasthāyibhāvasya śamasya nirākariṣyamāṇavivādasya navatve navamatayā pṛthaṅ nirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3579: raudraśaktyā tu janitaṃ cittavaiklavyaṃ bhayam // VisSd_3.178 //
GK16visa03cu:3589: ete hyeteṣvantarā utpadyamānaistaistaiviruddhairaviruddhaiśca bhāvairanucchinnāḥ pratyuta paripuṣṭā eva sahṛdayānubhavasiddhāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3596: cetovikāśo vilakṣaṇacittasaṃyogajanyaṃ jñānamupahāsyatājñānaparyyavasannaṃ yato mukhavikāśarūpaṃ smitaṃ jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:3601: raudro 'pakarttuṃ kṣamaḥ; tasya śaktyā sāmarthyena vaikalyaṃ bhāviduḥ khajñānapalāyanahetuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3605: kathamasya etādṛśo doṣa ityevaṃ vismayena janitā /
GK16visa03cu:3629: sukhaduḥ khādibhāvaistadbhāvasya ratyādisattāyāḥ bhāvanam udvodhanam ato ratyādiko bhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3632: bhāvairātmaniṣṭaiḥ kāvyaniṣṭairvā tasya rāmāderanukāryyasya yo bhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ tasya bhāvanaṃ śravaṇaṃ darśanaṃ vā /
GK16visa03cu:3636: bībhatso 'dbhuta ityaṣṭau rasāḥ śāntastathā mataḥ // VisSd_3.182 //
GK16visa03cu:3638: (lo, ī) evaṃ saparikarasya rasasya svarūpamuktadiśā nirūpayitumuddiśati /
GK16visa03cu:3641: śravye mahākāvyādau śānto 'pi navamo raso 'stīti tasya pṛthaṅ nirdeśaḥ na samyaṅ nāṭyopayogitvābhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:3643: evañca niratiśayasukhāsvādanalakṣaṇatvāt eka eva raso na viśeṣāḥ santi iti vādināṃ matamapyapāstam /
GK16visa03cu:3644: ata evoktam“yaktāraṇaṃ ca kāryyañca ye ca syurvyabhicāriṇaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3660: manmathasyāgamanaṃ prāptiḥ tadeva heturyasya tādṛśaḥ, kāmina eva śṛṅgārarasodvodhāt /
GK16visa03cu:3666: te ca svanāyakā eva paranāyakasya tu paroḍhāvat śṛṅgārabhāsālambanameva /
GK16visa03cu:3669: sambhoga eva maraṇasya jātaprāyamātrasyaiva varṇanīyatvāt vāstavamaraṇasyaiva tyāgaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3673_0: āṅpūrvāt ṛgatau ityasya dhātoḥ ghañantāt āraśabdasya vyutpāditatvāt tatra manmathodbhedasya
GK16visa03cu:3676: eṣāṃ rasānāṃ varṇadaivatakathanaṃ nāṭakādiṣu vidheyāvighnahetukeṣu naṭasaṃpādyapūjādiṣu pratyūhyate /
GK16visa03cu:3683: atroktasvarūpaḥ patiḥ, uktasvarūpā ca bālā ālambanavibhāvau /
GK16visa03cu:3689: vipralambho 'tha saṃbhoga ityeṣa dvividho mataḥ // VisSd_3.186 //
GK16visa03cu:3691: yatra tu ratiḥ prakṛṣṭā nābhīṣṭamupaiti vipralambho 'sā /

GK16visa03cu:3701: yatra tviti---ratiruktaṇṭhā prakṛṣṭā prakṛṣṭatāṃ yātiratiprakarṣasya nāyikāniṣṭatve nāyakaṃ nāyakapakṣe ca nāyikāṃ nopaiti na prāptotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3707: daśāviśeṣo yo 'prāptau pūrvarāgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_3.188 //
GK16visa03cu:3714: sa ca śravaṇāt darśanāt vā bhavatītyuktatvāt śravaṇadarśanayorupāyamāha---
GK16visa03cu:3717: indrajāle ca citre ca sākṣātsvaṣne ca darśanam // VisSd_3.189 //
GK16visa03cu:3720: (vi, ṭha) śravaṇaṃ tviti---dūtādimukhāt śravaṇam indrajālasvaprābhyāṃ cakṣuṣā vā darśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3724: unmādo 'tha vyādhirjaḍatā mṛtiriti daśātra kāmadaśāḥ // VisSd_3.190 //
GK16visa03cu:3738: tathā ca vyādhijvarāditi yaduktaṃ prāk tadīyādipadagrāhyamidaṃ muktamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:3742: “premārdrāḥ praṇayaspṛśaḥ paricayādudrāḍharāgodayā- stāstā mugdhadṛśo nisargamadhurāśceṣṭā bhaveyurmayi /
GK16visa03cu:3743: yāsvantaḥ karaṇasya bāhyakaraṇavyāpārarodhī kṣaṇā- dāśaṃsāparikalpitāsvapi bhavatyānandasāndro layaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:3747: mukhadṛśo mālatyāstāstāḥ anyādṛśaḥ ceṣṭā mayi bhaveyuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3753: yāsu ceṣṭāsu āśaṃsāyāmicchāyāṃ parikalpitāsvapi antaḥ karaṇasya ānandena sāndro vyāpto layaḥ līnatā kṣaṇādbhavati /
GK16visa03cu:3759: premārdrā iti---darśanādigato bhāvavyañjakaḥ kaścana cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ prema tatpūrvako vaśīkāraḥ praṇayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3765: iti cintākulaḥ kānto nidrāṃ naiti niśīthinīm” //
GK16visa03cu:3780: “tribhāgaśeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣamaṃ nimīlya netre sahasā vyabudhyana /
GK16visa03cu:3785: pārvatīsakhyā vijayāyā jaṭilaveśapracchannaṃ maheśa prati uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3786: bhāgatraye jāgaritatvāt śeṣāvaśiṣṭāsu niśāsu netre nimīlya mīlayitvā iyaṃ sahasā vyabudhyata /
GK16visa03cu:3787: kīdṛśī asatye harasya kaṇṭhe 'rpitabāhubandhanā satī he nīlakaṇṭha ! kva vrajasi ityevam alakṣyavāk anāśrayavāk /
GK16visa03cu:3791: “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3794: (lo, ṝ) pāṇiḍvati---parakṣetre na chedanīyo rogaḥ kṣetriyarogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3799: (vi, da) pāṇḍukṣāmāmiti---mālatyāṃ tadvirahāvasthāṃ pṛcchantyā lavaṅgikāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3800: he sakhi ! tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre acikitsyaṃ rogaṃ pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ karttṛ āvedayatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3805: dīho ṇīsāsaharo eso sāhei jīaitti paraṃ” //
GK16visa03cu:3809: dīrgho niḥ śvāsabhara eṣa sādhayati jīvatīti param /
GK16visa03cu:3812: ato dīrghaniśvāsa eva iyaṃ jīvati sādhayati ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa03cu:3826: “śephālikāṃ vidalitāmavalokya tanvī prāṇān kathaṃcidapi dhārayituṃ prabhūtā /
GK16visa03cu:3827: ākarṇya saṃprati rutaṃ caraṇāyudhānāṃ kiṃ vā bhaviṣyati na vedmi tapasvinī sā” //
GK16visa03cu:3834: prātaḥ kāla eveti tatra maraṇasaṃbhāvanayā sakhyā viṣādoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3837: (lo, ḷ) śephālikāmiti---śephālikāvidalanena niśīthakālaḥ sūcitaḥ tapasvinī śocyā /
GK16visa03cu:3840: “rolambāḥ paripūrayantu harito jhaṃkārakolāhalair mandaṃ mandamupaitu candanavanījāto nabhasvānapi /
GK16visa03cu:3841: mādyantaḥ kalayantu cūtaśikhare kelīpikāḥ pañcamaṃ prāṇāḥ satvaramaśmasārakaṭhinā gacchantu gacchantvamī” //
GK16visa03cu:3864: eṣa ca prakāraḥ karuṇaḥ vipralambhaviṣaya iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3872: unmādo mūrcchā mṛtirityetāḥ smaradaśā daśaiva syu” /
GK16visa03cu:3875: ādau vācyaḥ striyā rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ paścāttadiṅgitaiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3889: nīlī kusumbhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā pūrvarāgo 'pi ca tridhā // VisSd_3.195 //
GK16visa03cu:3900: (vi, ma) na cātiśobhate iti---avispaṣṭatvāt na cātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3901: śrīrāmasītayoriti---śrīrāmasya dhīrodāttatvāt purūvasa ivātyantapralāpābhāvena nātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3904: mānaḥ kopaḥ sa tu dvedhā praṇayerṣyāsamudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3908: praṇayena īrṣyayā vā samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3910: dvayoḥ praṇayamānaḥ syāt pramode sumahatyapi // VisSd_3.198 //
GK16visa03cu:3911: premṇaḥ kuṭilagāmitvāt kopo yaḥ kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GK16visa03cu:3912: dvayoriti nāyakasya nāyikāyāśca ubhayośca praṇayamāno varṇanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3923: praṇayamānena alīkaprasuptaṃ nāyakaṃ cumbitvā tenāślādhitāyā nāyikāyāstaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3924: he alīkaprasupta ! he vinimīlitākṣa ! he subhaga ! mayā te tava gaṇḍaparicumbanayā pulakitamarthāt tavāṅgameva mamāvakāśo mama sthityavakāśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3927: atra ca“prāgāmantritamasakṛdi“ti sūtreṇa te ityasya asambhavo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3936: etaccirāyitāyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ sakalāmapi śayyāmāvṛtya mithyāprasuptasya nāyakasya gaṇḍaṃ paricumbya tasyā vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:3942: atra pārvatīṃ tyaktvā sandhyāvandanāya gate maheśe pārvatyā māne tasya tadbhaṅgapravṛttau tatra hi “sandhyayā kamalayonikanyayā yā tanuḥ sutanu ! pūrvamujjhitā /
GK16visa03cu:3943: seyamastamudayañca sevate tena mānini ! mamātra gauravam //
GK16visa03cu:3958: atra ko mallaḥ kaściraṃ soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ na jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3960: anunayaparyantāsahatve tvasya na vipralambhabhedatā, kintu saṃbhogasañcāryākhyabhāvatvam /
GK16visa03cu:3967: “bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi dṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate ruddhāyāmapi vāci sammitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:3968: kārkaśyaṃ gamite 'pi cetasi tanū romāñcamālambate dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane” //
GK16visa03cu:3971: (vi, ṣa) mayā bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi mama dṛṣṭistaṃ priyaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate /
GK16visa03cu:3972: ityādirītyā tasmin jane priyatame dṛṣṭe sati kathaṃ mānasya nirvahaṇaṃ nirvāho bhaviṣyatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3976: “ekasmiñśayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16visa03cu:3993: yathā mama---“sakhi ! tvaṃ kiṃ brūṣe na bhavati madanyatra nirataḥ patirme dhūrtto 'sāvṛjurasi na jānāsi tamimam /
GK16visa03cu:3994: samudratyāgārādaparayuvatīsaṅganirato mayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tadalamiha saṃprītikathayā //
GK16visa03cu:4006: navanakheti---anyanāyikāsaṅgacihnakhapadādimaṃśukādinā yadyapi gopāyituṃ śaknoṣi tathāpi vimardetthāṅgarāgagandhaḥ kena prakāreṇa vārayituṃ śakya iti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4009: gotraskhalite yathā---“ekasmin śayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥ kopaparāṅmukhaṃ śayitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi /
GK16visa03cu:4010: āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamaḥ tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ tat kṣaṇād mābhūt supta ivetyamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvokṣitaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4012: “parasaktāsaktaḥ sakhi ! mama sa yat cāṭu kurute samasto 'sau vyājapraṇaya iti jānīhi niyatam /
GK16visa03cu:4013: tadā tāṃ tu dhyāyan sa khalu kitavaḥ kelisamaye muhustasya nāmnā nanu rahasi sambodhayati mām //
GK16visa03cu:4016: sāma bhedo 'tha dānaṃ ca natyupekṣe rasāntaram /
GK16visa03cu:4017: tadbhaṅgāya patiḥ kuryāt ṣaḍupāyāniti kramāt // VisSd_3.201 //
GK16visa03cu:4019: dānaṃ vyājena bhūṣādeḥ pādayoḥ patanaṃ natiḥ // VisSd_3.202 //
GK16visa03cu:4049: gacchannityatra upekṣā etāḥ pañca sūcitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4050: ebhirupāyairasya mānabhaṅgābhāve 'pi na tadupāyahīniḥ tasyāmajātodvegarūpasahakāriviraheṇa phalānutpādanāt /
GK16visa03cu:4052: rasāntarantūhyamiti--harṣād yathā---“cirapravāsāt suhṛdi prayāte yastatra harṣo mithunasya jātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4056: bhayād yathā---“pravṛtte mānabhaṅgāya patyau nāga upāgataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4057: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā kaṇṭhe patiṃ jagrāha māninī //
GK16visa03cu:4068: vipralambhasya pūrvarāgamānapravāsakaruṇarūpacāturvidhyasya uktatvāt pūrvarāgaṃ mānñca samāpya pravāsamāha---atha pravāsa iti /
GK16visa03cu:4073: mṛtiśceti kramājjñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha // VisSd_3.206 //
GK16visa03cu:4093: patyau pravāsasthe karatale gaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā cintayantīṃ prati kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4095: bhāvī bhavanbhūta iti tridhā syāttatra kāryajaḥ // VisSd_3.208 //
GK16visa03cu:4100: (vi, ṅa) pravāsasya kāryyāt śāpāt ityādi traividhyasyoktatvāt kāryyajameva trividhamāha--bhāvīti /
GK16visa03cu:4108: śokaste gamane kuto mama tato vāṣpaṃ kathaṃ muñcasi /
GK16visa03cu:4109: śīghraṃ na vrajasīti māṃ gamayituṃ kasmādiyaṃ te tvarā,
GK16visa03cu:4110: bhūyānasya saha tvayā jigamiṣorjovasya me saṃbhramaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4123: tvayā saha jigamiṣoḥ asya me jīvasya bhūyān saṃbhramastvaretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4126: tava gamane mama kutaḥ śokaḥ jīvanābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4130: mayi kṛtakapremakavastaba na khalu kadācid gamanam /
GK16visa03cu:4133: gamane hasasotpanne eṣāmapi niryāṇa ākulībhāvo nivarttatāmiti /
GK16visa03cu:4140: yātuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā gantavye sati jīvita ! priyasuhṛtsārthaḥ kimu tyajyate” //
GK16visa03cu:4145: he jīvita ! priyatame yātuṃ niścitacetasi sati tavāpi gantavye gatatve sati valayādipriyasuhṛtsārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4149: prasthānaṃ yātrā bahudinavyāpakatadvārttayā kārśyena valayabhraṃśaḥ gataṃ calitam /
GK16visa03cu:4151: tacca maraṇahetuśokādiduḥ khe 'pyaśrupātena tadduḥ khasya kiñcidupaśamāt /
GK16visa03cu:4158: atra pūrvarāgoktānāmabhilāṣādīnāmatroktānāṃ cāṅgāsauṣṭhavādīnāmapi daśānānubhayeṣāmapyubhayatra sambhave 'pi cirantanaprasiddhyā vivicya pratipādanam /
GK16visa03cu:4165: tatra ca devena urvaśyā haraṇameva daiva utpātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4174: tathā ca tatra vipralambha eva ityuktvā prathamaṃ karuṇaḥ paścāttu vipralambha ityabhiyuktānāṃ mataṃ darśayitumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4176: yathā pūrvarāgamānapravāsarūpā viśeṣāstathā maraṇasyāpi viśeṣasya sambhavādetadbhedena pravāsabhinnamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4180: etadgranthakṛtaḥ kuvalayāśvacarite ca yuvatermadālasāyastathābhāve kuvalayāśvasya śarīrāntareṇa labhye ajendumatīvṛttāntavat /
GK16visa03cu:4183: punaralabhye śarīrāntareṇa bālabhye tu karuṇākhya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4185: prathamaṃ tu karuṇa eva, ityabhiyuktā manyante /
GK16visa03cu:4186: yaccātra “saṅgamapratyāśānantaramapi bhavato vipralambhaśṛṅgārasya pravāsākhyo bheda eva” iti kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4190: ayamāśayaḥ---yathā bhavadbhirekadeśasthayorviyogo virahākhyaḥ videśasthayoḥ pravāsākhya iti īṣadbhinnadharmayoge 'pi bhedaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4192: śarīrāntare tu karuṇa iti bahutarabhinnayoge iti kā kṣatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4193: yattu kaiścid abhilāṣapravāserṣyāvirahaśāpahetukatvena pañcadhā vipralambhaityuktam tatra saṅgamaprāgabhāvarūpo 'bhilāṣaḥ pūrvarāga eva /
GK16visa03cu:4196: yadā tu paroḍhāviṣayaḥ tadā rasābhāvasattvāt na śṛṅgararasabhedaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4199: atra eva maharṣiṇā pravāsadaśadaśālakṣaṇe“pūrvānubhava jā jñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha“iti pūrvānubhavatvamuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4204: yadi caikadeśasthayorna pravāsastat kathaya kiyati yojane kiyati vā kośe 'sau maharṣibhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4205_1: purvaṃrāgastayā cakavākayostṛṇamātravyavadhāne 'pi śāpravāsā khyaśṛṅgārābhāsa iti sarvaṃ sustham /
GK16visa03cu:4220: kadācit ekaikena kadācittūbhayena nāpi darśanādikaṃ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4221: tena ekaikasya darśanādau api sambhogo boddhyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4224: digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4229: ayameka eva dhīraiḥ kathitaḥ saṃbhogaśṛṅgāraḥ // VisSd_3.211 //
GK16visa03cu:4234: “yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ śṛṅgāreṇopamīyate (upayujyate ca)” iti /
GK16visa03cu:4239: medhyaṃ pavitram anyad vā yat taduddīpanavibhāvarūpatayā vācyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4241: śṛṅgāreṇa hetunā upamīyate taduddīpanatayā upamīyate upasthāpyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4253: kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyān rāgo vivardhate” //
GK16visa03cu:4255: tatra pūrvarāgānantaraṃ saṃbhogo yathā kumārasambhave pārvatīparameśvarayoḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4259: sambhogaśṛṅgārasya evavidhatvamuktvā pūrvarāgādyānantaryeṇa tasya cāturvidhyaṃ vaktumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4266: “kṣemaṃ te nanu pakṣmalākṣi !- kisaaṃ khemaṃ mahaṅgaṃ diḍhaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:4267: etādṛkkṛśatā kutaḥ tuha puṇo puṭṭhaṃ sarīraṃ jado /
GK16visa03cu:4275: jai iti--- yadi idaṃ kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4276: ayamarthaḥ---yadāhameva praṇayinī kimiti māṃ parihṛtya dūraṃ gato 'si yaddhetukastavāyaṃ praśraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4278: saṃyogaviyogau ca parasparāyattatārūpau tena dūtipraṣaṇādeḥ saṃbhogaviṣayatvam /
GK16visa03cu:4284: (vi, ḍa) kṣemaṃ te nanu ityādi---ime dampatyoruktipratyuktī /
GK16visa03cu:4285: tatra pravāsādagatasya patyuḥ saṃskṛtoktiḥ; tat patnyāḥ prākṛtoktiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4289: puṭṭhamiti---tava punaḥ śarīraṃ puṣṭaṃ yata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4290: paṇaiṇīti---praṇayinyā mama dehasya saṃbhiśraṇāt saṃkocāt kṛśīkaraṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4292: niścitena tavānurāgeṇa yato 'haṃ kṛśā; ato māṃ kṛśāṃ kṛtvā manmāsena tava śarīraṃ puṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4294: he subhru ! tvattaḥ kāpi na me kāpi puṣṭiḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4295: jai idamiti yadīdaṃ tadā kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4297: matkārśye 'pi tava paṣṭyā ca mayi tavānurāgābhāvenaiva puṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4298: anurāgasattve tu madvirahāt kārśyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4300: tatra ca maraṇānantaraṃ jīvane mahāśvetāpuṇḍarīkayoḥ sambhoge /
GK16visa03cu:4314: smitahasita iti---kasyāciduttamanāyakasya smitaṃ kasyacittu hasitam ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4318: hāsya iti---vikṛtād vikiyāyuktāda vāgveśaceṣṭādeḥ kuhakākhyavañcanāprayogācca hāsyaraso bhavediti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4324: kiñcillakṣyadvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visa03cu:4326: apahasitaṃ sāstrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavatyatihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visa03cu:4340: kāyocchvasanadṛṣṭisaṅkocādayo harṣāvahitthādayaśca anubhāvavyabhicāriṇaḥ anuktā api sāmarthyāllabhyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4344: yasya hāsaḥ sa ceta kvāpi sākṣānnaiva nibadhyate /
GK16visa03cu:4350: (vi, ta) atra cottamādiṣu ya upahāsakastasya smitādikamunneyam /
GK16visa03cu:4353: abhedeneti---sa upahāsakaḥ sāmājikaiḥ vibhāvādisādhāraṇyāt yataḥ abhedena pratīyate tato hāsyaraso 'yamanumīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4358: tataśca svādanākhyena vyāpāreṇa hāsyarasa āsvādyata iti pūrvāparagranthaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4373: “vipine kva jaṭānibandhanaṃ tava cedaṃ kva manoharaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4374: anayorghaṭanā vidheḥ sphuṭaṃ nanu khaḍgena śirīṣakarttanam” //
GK16visa03cu:4382: tatra bandhuviyoge yathā---“hā mātastvaritāsi kutra kimidaṃ hā devatāḥ kvāśiṣaḥ dhik prāṇān patito 'śanirhutavahaste 'ṅgeṣu dagdhe dṛśau /
GK16visa03cu:4383: itthaṃ ghargharamadhyaruddhakaruṇāpaurāṅganānāṃ giraḥ citrasthānapi rodayanti śatadhā kurvanti bhittīrapi //
GK16visa03cu:4384: “idaṃ madālasāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ purastrīṇāṃ rodanasya kenāpi kathanam /
GK16visa03cu:4385: vittanāśe yathā-“kiṃ karomi kka gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kka vrajāmyaham /
GK16visa03cu:4391: vipralambhe ratiḥ sthāyī punaḥ saṃbhogahetukaḥ // VisSd_3.226 //
GK16visa03cu:4412: narakaripuṇā sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ sabhīmakirīṭinā- mayamahamasṛṅmedomāṃsaiḥ karomi diśāṃ balim” //
GK16visa03cu:4417_0: idaṃ svayaṃ mṛtasya mama pituḥ śiracchedarūpaṃ gurupātakaṃ yairudāyudhairmanujapaśubhirnirmayādairbhavaddhiḥ
GK16visa03cu:4417_1: kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā narakāsurasya ripuṇā śrīkṛṣṇena sārddhaṃ sabhīmakirīṭināṃ
GK16visa03cu:4417_2: teṣāṃ medomāṃsaiḥ diśāṃ diksthitabhūtānāṃ balimayamaham etatkṣaṇavartto ahaṃ karomītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4420: narakaripupadopādānāt narakahetupātakahantāraṃ gurupātakakāriṇañca haniṣyāmīti sūcanāt matkrodhe jagadeva naṅkṣyati iti sūcitam /
GK16visa03cu:4439: sa ca dānadarmayuddhairdayayā ca samanvitaścaturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.234 //
GK16visa03cu:4440: sa ca vīro dānavīro dharmavīro yuddhavīro dayāvīraśceti caturvidhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4446: harṣadhṛtyādibhaiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nīto dānavīratāṃ bhajate /
GK16visa03cu:4449: (vi, pa) tyāgaḥ saptasamudreti---saptasamudrāvṛttayā mahyā nirvyājadānaparyyantaḥ tyāga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4454: “rājyaṃ ca vasu dehaśca bhāryā bhrātṛsutāśca ye /
GK16visa03cu:4455: yacca loke mamāyattaṃ tad dharmāya sadodyatam” //
GK16visa03cu:4457: bho laṅkeśvara ! dīyatāṃ janakajā rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācate ko 'yaṃ te mativibhramaḥ smara nayaṃ nādyāpi kiṃcidratam /
GK16visa03cu:4458: naivaṃ cet kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ kaṇṭhāsṛjā paṅkilaḥ pattrī naiṣa sahiṣyate mama dhanurjyābandhabandhūkṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4462: rāmo rāmanāmnā khyāto vālihantā svayaṃ yācate /
GK16visa03cu:4465: mayā saha sandherupāyaḥ ko 'pi na gata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4466: naivaṃ cet sītā na dīyate cet tadā mama dhanuḥ jyābandhasya bandhūkṛta eṣa patrī vāṇo na sahiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:4470: “śirāmukhaiḥ syandata eva raktamadyāpi dehe mama māṃsamasti /
GK16visa03cu:4471: tṛptiṃ na paśyāmi tavāpi tāvat kiṃ bhakṣaṇāttvaṃ virato garutman ! /
GK16visa03cu:4476: garuḍena bhakṣyamāṇaṃ nāgaṃ paritrātuṃ tadbhakṣaṇāya ātmadehamarpitavatastadbhakṣitabahumāṃsasya jīmūtavāhanasyātṛptaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4477: he garutman ! adyāpi mama dehe māṃsamasti /
GK16visa03cu:4478: atra hetumāha---mama kīdṛśasya śirāmukheṃ raktaṃ syandata eva /
GK16visa03cu:4479: ato yadyapi bahūni māṃsāni bhakṣitāni tathāpi tṛptimātmani na paśyāmi /
GK16visa03cu:4491: (vi, bha) bhayānakānubhāveṣu pulakaḥ kiñcid aṅgeṣu romāñcaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4507: ārttaḥ paryastanetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretaraṅkaḥ karaṅkādaṅkasthādasthiṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamadhyagramatti” //
GK16visa03cu:4512: utkṛtyeti---karālārādhanāya gatasya mādhavasya śavaṃ bhuñjānaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4515: aṅkasthāt śavāt asthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyaṃmāṃsaṃ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ sannavyagraṃ yathā syāttathātti /
GK16visa03cu:4516: kiṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ kṛttiṃ carmma utkṛtyokṛtya /
GK16visa03cu:4517: athānantaraṃ aṃse bhujamūle sphici nitambe pṛṣṭe ca /
GK16visa03cu:4521: māṃsāni kīdṛśāni pṛthunā ucchothena tatphullatayā bhūyāṃsi bahūni tathā atidurgandhīni /
GK16visa03cu:4532: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaveduddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visa03cu:4544: dordaṇḍeti--rāmeṇa dhanuṣi bhagne tacchabdaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4545: dordaṇḍenāñcitasya utkṣiptasya candraśekharadhanurdaṇḍasyāvabhaṅgena udgato jhaṅkāradhvaniḥ aho 'dyāpi na viśrāmyati /
GK16visa03cu:4547: āryyasya rāmasya bālacaritānāṃ prastāvanāyāḥ prakhyāpanāyāḥ ḍiṇḍimo vādyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4548_1: brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍasya caṇḍaśabdāt utphulya punarmilitaṃ brahmāṇḍakapāladvayaṃ tadudare
GK16visa03cu:4555: evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā milati jāyamāne brahmaṇḍabhāṇḍodare bhrāmyan piṇḍitaḥ piṇḍībhūtaḥ caṇḍimā caṇḍatvaṃ yasyeti jhaṅkāradhvanorviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4568: (vi, ra) anityatvādinā ityatra ādipadāt iṣṭaviyogādinā vairāgyaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4576: “rathyāntaścaratastathā dhṛtajarat kanthālavasyādhvagaiḥ satrāsaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca sadayaṃ dṛṣṭasya tairnāgaraiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4577: nirvyājīkṛtacitsudhārasamudā nidrāyamāṇasya me niḥśaṅkaḥ karaṭaḥ kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ viluṇṭhiṣyati” //
GK16visa03cu:4582: nirbojīkṛtayā citsudhārasamudā jñānāmṛtaharṣeṇa nidrāyamāṇasya me kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ karaṭaḥ kāko viluṇṭhiṣyati /
GK16visa03cu:4585: bhikṣāviluṇṭhanādibhayābhāvāt niḥ śaṅkaṃ carataḥ rathyāntaḥ nagararājamārgamadhye carataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4587: ataḥ taiḥ rathyāsthaiḥ adhvagairnāgaraiḥ kanthādiviparītadarśanāt satrāsañca sakautukañca daridrāvasthādarśanāt sadayañca dṛṣṭasya /
GK16visa03cu:4596: nirbojīkṛto yo 'sau citjñānameva sudhārasaḥ tena prakāśena yā mut prītiḥ sukhaikamayatā tayā nidrāyamāṇasya paśyato 'pi prameyajātamapaśyataḥ citsudhārasasya /
GK16visa03cu:4597: nirbojīkṛtasyāyamarthaḥ-- nirgataṃ bījaṃ saṃsārakāraṇam avidyākhyaṃ yasmāt prakāśādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4598: nirgataṃ bījam ātmaprakāśajñānakāraṇaṃ mano yatra sa nirbojaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4604: dayāvīrādau hi nāgānandadau jīmūtavāhanāderantarā malayavatyādyanurāgāderante ca vidyādharacakravatitvādyāpterdarśanādahaṅkāropaśamo na dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:4608: “na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na cintā na dveṣarāgau na ca kacidicchā /
GK16visa03cu:4609: rasaḥ sa śāntaḥ kathito manīndraiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu samapramāṇaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4613: nāgānandeti---jīmūtavāhananāyake nāgānande nāṭake kāvyaprakāśe śāntasya jīmūtavāhanasya yuktimākṣipatiataśca iti /
GK16visa03cu:4615: atra ca iti---mokṣāvasthīyaśāntaḥ sa evayato rasatāmetīti kāvyanāṭyasamarpitaḥ sanniti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4619: sarveṣu loṣṭrāśmakāñcanādiṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu gamaṃ tulyaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñānaṃ yatra /
GK16visa03cu:4621: ityevaṃrūpasya śāntasya mokṣāvasthāyāmevātmasvarūpāpattilakṣaṇāyāṃ prādurbhāvāttatra sañcāryādīnāmabhāvāt kathaṃ rasatvamityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:4623: (lo, ū) ātmeti---ātmasvarūpasya āpattiḥ prāptiḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4625: yuktaviyuktadaśāyāmavasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4626: rasatāmeti tadasmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiśca na viruddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visa03cu:4633: tena śāntasya vaiṣayikasukhabhinnaṃ tṛṣṇākṣayādhīnaṃ sukhamastyeva ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4636: yukteti---tatra viṣayebhyaḥ parāvṛtya sākṣāt kartavye brahmaṇi mano nidhāya varttamānatvacintāsantānavān yuktaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4639: yaśca bhūtvendriyajayī aṇimādyaḥ kāyasiddhīrdūraśraṇādyā hyatīndriyāṇi sve sve viṣaye sahattvasannikarṣādisahakāranirapekṣāṇi varttante,
GK16visa03cu:4655: kadā vārāṇasyāmiha suradhunīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno 'ñjalipuṭam /
GK16visa03cu:4656: aye gaurīnātha ! tripurahara ! śaṃbho ! trinayana ! prasīdeti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān” //
GK16visa03cu:4660_0: kadā vārāṇasyāmiti--iha vārāṇasyāṃ suradhunyā gaṅgāyā rodhasi tīre pulin vā vasan
GK16visa03cu:4660_1: ahaṃ kaupīnadvayañca vasānaḥ śirasyañjalipuṭaṃ dadhānaśca aye gaurīnāthetyādinā'krośan
GK16visa03cu:4661: atra kaupīnādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sukhādirāhityaprāptyā sarvāhaṅkārarāhityalābhād devaviṣayaraterapi śāntarasatvaprāptiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4664: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4670: ātmāpakāreṇāpi paropacikīrṣāprayojakadharmaviśeṣasya dayātvāt sukhasambandhini anurāgaviśeṣasya ca snehatvāt iti anayorbhedāt /
GK16visa03cu:4683: “yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgalīm /
GK16visa03cu:4684: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna sor'bhakaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4687: (vi, kṣa) yadāha dhātryeti---uditasya uccāritasya prathamaṃ prathamoditamiti“rājadantādisamāsāt” /
GK16visa03cu:4688: dātryā uditaśca nārāyaṇetyādiśabdaśca prathamaṃ“nā“ityādi yadvacaḥ raghurāha tadīyāṃ dhātrīyām aṅgulimavalambya yacca yayau praṇipātaśikṣayā yacca namno 'bhūt,
GK16visa03cu:4689: tena karmaṇā piturdilīpasya mudaṃ tatāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4696: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīrarasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visa03cu:4703: unmādādirna tu sthāyī na pātre syairyameti yat /
GK16visa03cu:4708: (lo, e) nanūnmādānāṃ sthāyitvamavalambya kathamanye 'pi rasā noktāḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--kuto 'pīti /
GK16visa03cu:4718: rasanādrasā iti---rasanam āsvādanaṃ tadrūpasādṛśyāt gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā rasapadārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4722: nanu yadi rasātmakaṃ vākyameva kāvyaṃ tāha bhāvādipradhānamakāvya syādityaśaṅkyāha---rasābhāvāditi /
GK16visa03cu:4735: udvuddhamātraḥ jñātamātraḥ; natu viśiṣya niścita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4736: sthāyī sthāyibhāvavad vācyo natu sthiratāmāpanna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4737: nanu sañcāriṇastāvadrasanadharmasambandhina eva, tataśca sañcārisattve 'vaśyaṃ rasasattvam /
GK16visa03cu:4738: tathā ca dhvanireva rasa ityataḥ kathaṃ tatra bhāvadhvanitvamityata āha---na bhāvo raseti /
GK16visa03cu:4740: tatra yathāpradhānatayā rasastiṣṭhati evaṃ rase 'pi apradhānatayā bhāvastiṣṭhatītyāha---na bhāvahīna iti /
GK16visa03cu:4742_0: ityuktadiśā paramālocanayā paramaviśrāntisthānena rasena sahaiva vartamānā api rājānugatavivāhapravṛttabhṛtyavadāpātato
GK16visa03cu:4742_1: yatra pradhānyenābhivyaktā vyabhicāriṇo devamunigurunṛpādivaṣayā ca ratirudbuddhamātrā
GK16visa03cu:4748: evaṃ pradhānamapi raso nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyasya bhāvasya pradhānasya anuga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4749: udvuddhamātrā ityādikaṃ sthāyino bhāvā ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4750: teṣāṃ rasatānāptau hetuḥ vibhāvādiriti, tairaparipoṣaśca tasya viśiṣyāniścitatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:4765: “divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka ! prakāmam /
GK16visa03cu:4770: divi vā bhuvi veti---he narakāsurāntaka maraṇe jāte mama divi bhuvi vā narake vā vāso 'stu /
GK16visa03cu:4773: tadā ca divi vā ityādikam asambaddhaṃ syāt /
GK16visa03cu:4779: tathāpi śuśraṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena tṛpyate” //
GK16visa03cu:4784: he mune tava amunā vilokanenaiva kṛtārthaḥ kato 'smi /
GK16visa03cu:4786: nabarhitaṃ nāśitam aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ yena tādṛśena /
GK16visa03cu:4787: tathāpi tava garīyasīḥ giraḥ śuśrūṣuḥ śrotu micthurammi /
GK16visa03cu:4789: kena janena śreyasi maṅgale tṛpyate; api tu na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4793: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4797: tava vājirājyā nirdhūtaṃ yad dhūlipaṭalaṃ tena paṅkilām /
GK16visa03cu:4812: kandarpeṇa dhanuṣi āropite ākālike vasante jāte tapasyato maheśasya pārvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid dhairyyaparāvṛttivarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:4815: dhairyyaparāvṛtteḥ kiñcid udbhāvena rasatāmanāptatvena bhāvatvasyaiva prāpterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4817: (lo, o) ratirityanantaraṃ paripoṣaṃ na nīteti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4823: (vi, ña) saṃcāriṇaḥ pradhānāni ityanena pradhānībhūtasyaiva vyabhicāribhāvasya bhāvatvaprāptiruktā /
GK16visa03cu:4843: anaucityaṃ cātra rasānāṃ bhāratādipraṇītalakṣaṇānāṃ sāmagrīrahitatve ekadeśayogitvopalakṣaṇaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4852: tallakṣaṇākteṃ yat kiñcid sattve ekadeśayogitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4881: evamuttarottaraṃ gataparaṃ kvacit tadviṣayaparaṃ kvacit tadviśiṣṭaparaṃ yogyatayā bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4884: “svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanamidaṃ bālāhamekākinī kṣoṇīmāvṛṇute tamālamalinacchāyā tamaḥ santatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4886: kṛṣṇa ! sahasā vartmeti gopyā giraḥ śrutvā tāṃ parirabhya manmathakalāsakto hariḥ pātu vaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4889: (vi, ḍha) sandhyākāle panthānamāvṛtya tiṣṭhantaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ prati gopyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4892: tathā hi mugdhataro mūḍhataro mama tava āsaṅgaṃ tarkayitumasamarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4895: tatra gurupatnīgatatve yathā--- madhau prabhūte pikanādadūte mandāniloddhūtavikāśicūte /
GK16visa03cu:4897: munipatnīgatatve yathā--- tapovibhāvasaṃbhavātulavibhūtikaḥ saubhari- rmunirnṛpatikanyakāśataparigrahaḥ kāmataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4898: pracumbati muhurmuhuḥ kucanipīḍamāliṅgati smitottaramudīkṣate parihasatyajastraṃ priyām //
GK16visa03cu:4901: iha hi svāmīti mughdhatara iti ca padābhyāṃ bhayadatvaṃ pakṣe priyatvābhāvo ratināgaratvābhāvaśca,
GK16visa03cu:4904: yauvanena yauvanena ca etādṛśi vayasi anurūpapatirnāsti,
GK16visa03cu:4911: “kāntāsta eva bhuvanatritaye 'pi manye yeṣāṃ kṛte sutanu ! pāṇaḍurayaṃ kapolaḥ” /
GK16visa03cu:4926: avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā svakacānutkacayāñcakāra bhartrā” //
GK16visa03cu:4930: jaghanasthaleti---kāpi bhillī kirātī jaghanasthale naddhā dhṛtā patravalliḥ patralatā yathā sā tathā /
GK16visa03cu:4931: girimallīkusumāni kuṭajapuṣpāṇi avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā satī bhartrā svaprayojyena svakacān arthādavacitakusumaiḥ utkacayāñcakāra uddīptāṃścakāretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4933: atra ca valli ityatra hrasvāntavalliśabdasya rūpam /
GK16visa03cu:4945: cañcadvipañcīkalanādabhaṅgīsaṅgītaṃ cañcantyā vipañcyā vīṇāyāḥ kalanādabhaṅgyā saṅgītam /
GK16visa03cu:4949: “raktotphullaviśālalolanayanaḥ kampottarāṅgo muhur- muktvā karṇamapetabhīrdhṛ tadhanurbāṇo hareḥ paśyataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4950: ādhmātaḥ kaṭukoktibhiḥ svamasakṛddovikramaṃ kīrtaya- nnaṃsāsphoṭapaṭuryudhiṣṭhiramasau intuṃ praviṣṭor'junaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4954: atra ca tāpasasya jīmūtavāhanasya nṛpasya malayavatyāṃ ratau bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4956: karṇāt prāptāpamānasya yudhiṣṭhirasya kaṭukoktibhirādhmātaḥ kupitor'junaḥ yudhyamānaṃ karṇaṃ tyaktvā yudhiṣṭhiraṃ hantuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4957: apetabhīrguruhananabhayarahito hareḥ kṛṣṇasya paśyataḥ iti---paśyantaṃ harimanādṛtya ityatrānādare ṣaṣṭhī /
GK16visa03cu:4960: hīnaniṣṭhe śānte gurvādyālambane hāsye brahmavadhādyutsāhe 'dhamapātragate vīre ca nodāhṛtam /
GK16visa03cu:4961: krameṇa yathā caṇḍālayonāviha janma labdhaṃ dvijātijanmāpi na kāṅkṣitaṃ me /
GK16visa03cu:4962: puṇye vane kkāpi vapurvihāsyan punarbhavacchedamahaṃ samīhe // 1 //
GK16visa03cu:4964: adhyāpayatveṣa guruḥ sadā me lālāktavaktro maladigdhavāsāḥ // 2 //
GK16visa03cu:4967: naredraputrān mṛgayā pravṛttān viddhaṃ mṛgaṃ netumupāttavegāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4968: amī kirātāḥ śarapūrṇacāpā dhāvanti matvā tṛṇavattameva // 4 //
GK16visa03cu:4976: aśaknuvanniti---kauśiko vāsavo yasyāsurasya sahastraśmeriva darśana soḍhumaśaknuvan bibhyat hemādriguhāṃ praviśya dināni nināya /
GK16visa03cu:4979: tathā hi kauśikaḥ pecakaḥ sahastraraśmerdarśanaṃ soḍhumaśaknuvan adriguhāṃ praviśya yathā dināni nayati,
GK16visa03cu:4981: tathā ca pecaka iva indra ityupamādhvaniḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4985: atra śloke bhayasya sthāyibhāvasya bibhyadiyetadvācyatvāt vyaṅgyatvameva nāsti,
GK16visa03cu:4988: tadudāharaṇaṃ tu jātiduṣṭo 'pi saṃślāghyaḥ sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4993: bhāvābhāso lajjādike tu veśyādiviṣaye syāt // VisSd_3.266 //
GK16visa03cu:4997: veśyādiniṣṭhe yathā--- līlānamramukhī śiroṃ'śukamavākṛṣyānayantī puro netropāntavilokanena parito yūnāṃ dhayantī manaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4998: dṛṣṭā vāravilāsinī nanu sakhe ! kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ puṇyaughaṃ paripākamāśamayituṃ līlottaraṃ gacchati //
GK16visa03cu:5011: bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ saṃdhiḥ śabalatā matā // VisSd_3.267 //
GK16visa03cu:5013: “sutanu ! jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃvidho 'bhūt /
GK16visa03cu:5014: iti nigadati nāthe tiryagāmīlitākṣyā nayanajalamanalpaṃ muktamuktaṃ na kiñcit” //
GK16visa03cu:5017: vrajati ramaṇo niḥ śvasyoccau stanasthitahastayā nayanasalilacchannā dṛṣṭiḥ sakhīṣu niveśitā” //
GK16visa03cu:5025: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti came” //
GK16visa03cu:5037: (vi, ba) kvākāryyamiti---urvaśīvirahe maraṇe pravṛtya nivṛttasya purūravasa uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:5050: iti sāhityadarpaṇe rasādinirūpaṇo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
